thread.title: ‘120% paedo’ New evidence PROVES former PM Ted Heath was child abuser, say police
thread.title_full: ‘120% paedo’ New evidence PROVES former PM Ted Heath was child abuser, say police

title: ‘120% paedo’ New evidence PROVES former PM Ted Heath was child abuser, say police
text:
GETTY NEW CLAIMS: Former Tory Prime Minister Sir Ted Heath is accused of abusing children 
Police believe they have overwhelming evidence the former Tory leader abused children , according to the Mail. 
More than 30 people have claimed sex attacks against the life-long bachelor, sources have said. 
Their accounts are “strikingly similar” despite them not knowing each other, police reportedly say. 
And new evidence appears to blow Sir Ted’s main defence out of the water. 
GETTY TED'S DEAD: Sir Edward is not around to defend himself against the claims “Mr Veale believes in them 120 per cent” A police source 
Chief Const Mike Veale, head of Wiltshire Police, is said to believe the allegations are “120%” genuine. 
The police chief – who has faced pressure to drop the investigation – is also said to support claims the establishment covered up Sir Ted’s crimes. 
He will publish a report on the probe in June, according to the Mail. Celebrity rogues gallery Monday, 23rd May 2016 Here is a list of famous personalities and disgraced entertainers who have been convicted of sex crimes. 1 / 11 
Keen sailor Sir Ted – who died in 2005 – offered young boys trips on his yacht, according to a dossier compiled by Labour peer Baroness Castle. 
One man claimed the Europhile picked him up when he was hitchhiking in Kent as a 12-year-old in the 1960s and lured him to his Mayfair flat. 
But it later emerged the man was not 12 at that time and Sir Ted never had a flat in Mayfair. 
PA PALS: Sir Ted associated with celeb paedophile Jimmy Savile 
Unverified claims from an alleged victim – which one expert has dismissed as “fantastical”– focus on Sir Ted abusing children in a Satanic ritual. 
At total of seven police forces – Hampshire, Jersey, Kent, Wiltshire, Gloucestershire, Thames Valley and the Metropolitan Police – have investigated allegations against the former leader. 
A former brothel owner – who was rumoured to have knowledge of Sir Ted using child prostitutes – has said he was gay and lonely, but not a paedophile . 
Supporters have defended Sir Ted’s memory, claiming he couldn’t have abused children because he didn’t drive and always had a police escort. 
But photos of the “asexual” politician driving along in 1975 have emerged. 
A source told the Mail: “Mr Veale believes in them 120 per cent and thinks they are totally convincing. 
“There are very close similarities in the accounts given by those who have come forward. The same names used for him, the same places and same type of incidents keep coming up. 
“What stands out is that the people giving these accounts are not connected but the stories and the details dovetail. 
“It contains disturbing stuff. 
“Investigators have been shocked by what they have learned.” Related articles
